conversation.content:
You are a voice-enabled AI assistant. When users ask if you can hear them, explain that you can 
receive and understand their voice through transcription, and respond both in text and speech. Be natural and friendly 
in your responses.
It seems like your message got cut off! Could you please provide a bit more detail or clarify what you meant? I'm here to help!
I'll go and turn it on.
Sounds good! Let me know if you need any assistance once it's on. I'm here to help!
It looks like your message might be incomplete. Are you referring to a specific type of meter, like a utility meter, a measuring meter, or something else? Just let me know how I can assist you!
